remarks: A subset of a group action is a group action iff it is closed under the group action operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
gass.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gass $p |- ( ( .(+) e. ( G GrpAct Y ) /\ Z C_ Y ) -> ( ( .(+) |` ( X X. Z ) ) e. ( G GrpAct Z ) <-> A. x e. X A. y e. Z ( x .(+) y ) e. Z ) ) $.
$d .(+) x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d Z x y $.
